meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #703.

td.p: Heywood Sobel, an engineer from Mar Vista, California
Colleen Patten, a waitress from Santa Barbara, California
Cinthea Stahl, a student from Studio City, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,600)

tr.td: STATE CAPITALS
FICTIONAL SISTERS
FRUIT
MUSICAL ANATOMY
THE '50s
FROM THE FRENCH
